violations.title: Image missing alt attribute
violations.description: All images must have an alt attribute for screen readers
violations.fix: Add alt attribute with meaningful description

violations.title: Interactive div should be a button
violations.description: Div with click handler should be a semantic button element
violations.fix: Replace with <button> or add proper ARIA role and keyboard support

violations.title: Button has no accessible name
violations.description: Button must have text content or aria-label
violations.fix: Add visible text or aria-label attribute

violations.title: HTML missing lang attribute
violations.description: The <html> element must have a lang attribute
violations.fix: Add lang attribute to specify page language
